body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Robert Lewis and the customer's name is Catherine Rodriguez.  The conversation is about MetaCar (a Car Rental Agency ) and is a conversation about customer service.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Robert Lewis, and I represent MetaCar, your go-to car rental agency.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's a pleasure to meet you, Catherine. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I’m feeling a bit frustrated with my recent rental experience.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Catherine. Can you please tell me which location you rented from?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I rented from the downtown location.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information. Can I also have your phone number to look up your reservation?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's seven one seven, two eight one, three four five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! And could you provide me with your email address as well?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for the details, Catherine. I will look into your situation right away.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Catherine. If you have any more questions, don't hesitate to ask. Have a great day!
